ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] OT: Recommendation for a home firewall
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, Minkin yeah, it s me...been a long while Mac got stuck in a rut for a long while (5 months?), died 37 times getting from 22 to 23 (yes folks, that s 37
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, Minkin

yeah, it's me...been a long while
Mac got stuck in a rut for a long while (5 months?), died 37 times getting
from 22 to 23 (yes folks, that's 37 dings to 23)
I started playing an enchanter, warrior and monk for a while. my guild
finally has a mess of people my level, so i'm getting bac into the swing of
things. Heck, I got 4.5 bubbles of xp in level 26 one night in lower guk
(yeah, we did lower guk with two groups from 26 (me) to 33 (cleric), and got
hellacious xp.

Give me a holler in game sometime. I catch up with Halana/Tani every once
in a while, as well.

MacGrough MichRathe
27th Out-of-tune Bard
Solusek Ro Wanderers

----- Original Message -----
From: "Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 12, 2000 6:33 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT: Recommendation for a home firewall


> Hi Mac, nice to see you're still around, i havent seen you since way back
> when i was in unrest (i think) (like 6+ months ago). If its not you im
> thinking of then well nice to see another lister on sol ro
>
> /wave
> Minkin
>
